name: Galactic Bunny Spin
description:
A pretty simple game with waggly ears, evil mechanical spinning tops and as always: an outer space setting!

Use the arrow Keys or WASD  to control the bunny's vessel, R to access the restart/quit menu, and M to mute the sounds.

This game was made in 3 days as a solo class project at CNAM-ENJMIN. I used free textures created by Joao Paulo (https://3dtextures.me), a picture from the European Southern Observatory and the Bahnschrift Windows font.
